Html: Is it possible to use a string instead of a double or date along the graphs axis?  For instance, I'd like to run the build number of a project along the x axis to show performance results for each build.

Hi!

For now this feature is unavailable, but we'll add it to DynamicDataDisplay in near future.

Best regards,
Mikhail Brinchuk,
DynamicDataDisplay Dev Team.
Was there any change since 2009? Was this feature developed, or not?

You can look at my answer on this thread. ﻿﻿
